items.name: Crispy Squid
items.description: Deep fried crispy baby squid. Served with mixed baby leaf salad and homemade aoli.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: 8 spicy, bbq or peri peri chicken wings. Served with blue cheese dipping sauce

items.name: Popcorn Halloumi
items.description: Diced halloumi deep fried in a five spice mix and served with dill and yoghurt dipping sauce

items.name: Popcorn Chicken
items.description: Diced chicken pieces deep fried in a five spice mix and served with srirachi mayo

items.name: Fries
items.description: Triple cooked, hand cut french fries served with homemade mayo

items.name: Spicy & Sticky Chicken
items.description: Crispy chicken pieces coated in a sticky harrisa sauce served with a homemade slaw

items.name: Fish & Chips
items.description: Traditional beer battered cod and chips

items.name: Vegan Burger
items.description: Plant based pattie with special blend of herbs and spices

items.name: Full Rack of Ribs
items.description: Full rack served with homemade grilling sauce and hand cut chips

items.name: Kings Classic Burger
items.description: Beef pattie with crispy bacon & American cheese. Served with hand cut chips

items.name: Bang Bang Chicken Burger
items.description: Spiced flash fried chicken breast served with red cabbage slaw and srirachi mayo

items.name: Welsh Rarebit Burger
items.description: Beef pattie served with cripsy bacon and topped with welsh rarebit paste and served with hand cut chips

items.name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Brownie
items.description: Chocolate fudge brownie with a layer of sweetened peanut butter served with ice cream

items.name: Vanilla Cheesecake
items.description: A slice of homemade vanilla cheesecake served with a scoop of vanilla icecream and raspberry sauce

items.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
items.description: Homemade sticky toffee pudding served with either a scoop of ice cream or custard

items.name: Ice Cream
items.description: Three scoops of either chocolate, vanilla and strawberry ice cream
